import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import {useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import { listProductDetails } from "../actions/productActions"; const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match)) }, [match]); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: €{product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: €{product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out Of Stock"} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
